subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Many drivers in the Chase say Jimmie Johnson is the favorite to win the title, even though he did not finish the 26-race regular season as the top driver in the series.
snippet: Many drivers in the Chase say Jimmie Johnson is the favorite to win the title, even though he did not finish the 26-race regular season as the top driver in the series.
